name: Chess-AI
description:
A chess AI written in java programming language.

The AI is not that good, but I enjoyed working on this project. I am looking forward to implementing neural network for evaluation, hopefully that will make its decision making more accurate. I have put a lot of effort in it, so I hope that you all will appreciate my work and help me address some major issues with the game and the AI.

The game is built upon Schneizel Chess Engine.
